`Beacons` receiving by [HAM radio](http://radio.pw-sat.pl) and PW-Sat2 GSs. Main PW-Sat2 GS sends `Send Beacon` telecommands to request more beacon frames.
To check that both `/leop_telemetry` and `/leop` exist.
Requested chunks of `/leop_telemetry` an: To find out what was happening at the beginning.
Requested chunks of `/telemetry.current`: To get a better look on the state of the satellite between few last orbits.
If a stable radio link was established call this telecommand. It disables `Antenna Deployment Process` after every reboot.
